meanings.definition: To clean (something) by destroying harmful bacteria or viruses
meanings.sent1: I disinfected the kitchen counter to make sure it was free from germs.
meanings.sent2: The hospital staff disinfected all the medical equipment before using it on patients.
meanings.sent3: After the superhero disinfected the city, everyone felt safe from the evil germs.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was so bright, it disinfected the gloomy mood in the room.
meanings.sent5: The powerful disinfectant spray disinfected the entire room in seconds.

meanings.sent1: The disinfected room smelled fresh and clean.
meanings.sent2: She wore disinfected gloves to ensure a sterile environment.
meanings.sent3: The disinfected toys sparkled under the bright lights.
meanings.sent4: The disinfected surfaces gleamed in the sunlight like polished glass.
meanings.sent5: The disinfected area was so spotless, it looked brand new.
